25  package se.jguru.nazgul.core.cache.impl.inmemory;
26  
27  import org.junit.Assert;
28  import org.junit.Before;
29  import org.junit.Test;
30  import se.jguru.nazgul.core.cache.api.CacheListener;
31  import se.jguru.nazgul.core.cache.api.transaction.AbstractTransactedAction;
32  import se.jguru.nazgul.core.clustering.api.UUIDGenerator;
33  
34  import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
35  import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
36  import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
37  import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
38  import java.io.Serializable;
39  import java.util.ArrayList;
40  import java.util.HashMap;
41  import java.util.List;
42  import java.util.Map;
43  import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
44  import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
45  
46  /**
47   * @author <a href="mailto:lj@jguru.se">Lennart J&ouml;relid</a>, jGuru Europe AB
48   */
49  public class InMemoryMapCacheTest {
50  
51      // Shared state
52      private InMemoryMapCache unitUnderTest;
53      private ConcurrentMap<String, Serializable> cache;
54      private ConcurrentMap<String, CacheListener<String, Serializable>> listeners;
55  
56      @Before
57      public void setupSharedState() {
58  
59          cache = new ConcurrentHashMap<String, Serializable>();
60          listeners = new ConcurrentHashMap<String, CacheListener<String, Serializable>>();
61          unitUnderTest = new InMemoryMapCache(UUIDGenerator.getInstance(),
62                  2000L,
63                  cache,
64                  listeners,
65                  10,
66                  true);
67      }
68  
69      @Test
70      public void validateNormalCacheLifecycle() {
71  
72          // Assemble
73          final String key = "key";
74  
75          // Act
76          final boolean keyInCache_before = unitUnderTest.containsKey(key);
77          final Serializable before = unitUnderTest.put(key, "value");
78  
79          final boolean keyInCache_mid = unitUnderTest.containsKey(key);
80          final Serializable mid = unitUnderTest.put(key, "value2");
81          final Serializable after = unitUnderTest.get(key);
82          final Serializable removed = unitUnderTest.remove(key);
83  
84          final boolean keyInCache_removed = unitUnderTest.containsKey(key);
85          final Serializable shouldBeNull = unitUnderTest.get(key);
86  
87          // Assert
88          Assert.assertNull(before);
89          Assert.assertEquals("value", mid);
90          Assert.assertEquals("value2", after);
91          Assert.assertEquals("value2", removed);
92          Assert.assertNull(shouldBeNull);
93          Assert.assertFalse(keyInCache_before);
94          Assert.assertTrue(keyInCache_mid);
95          Assert.assertFalse(keyInCache_removed);
96      }
97  
98      @Test
99      public void validateNullResultWhenRemovingNonexistentElement() {
100 
101         // Assemble
102         final String key = "key";
103 
104         // Act
105         final Serializable result = unitUnderTest.remove(key);
106 
107         // Assert
108         Assert.assertNull(result);
109     }
110 
111     @Test
112     public void validateIterationOverAllKnownKeys() {
113 
114         // Assemble
115         final Map<String, String> data = new HashMap<String, String>();
116         data.put("fooo", "bar");
117         data.put("gnat", "baz");
118 
119         for (String current : data.keySet()) {
120             unitUnderTest.put(current, data.get(current));
121         }
122 
123         // Act & Assert
124         for (String current : unitUnderTest) {
125             Assert.assertEquals(unitUnderTest.get(current), data.get(current));
126         }
127     }
128 
129     @Test(expected = UnsupportedOperationException.class)
130     public void validateExceptionOnNotFakingTransactions() {
131 
132         // Assemble
133         final InMemoryMapCache defaultConstructedCache = new InMemoryMapCache();
134         final AbstractTransactedAction transactedAction = new AbstractTransactedAction("Irrelevant") {
135             @Override
136             public void doInTransaction() throws RuntimeException {
137                 // Nothing sensible here.
138             }
139         };
140 
141         // Act & Assert
142         defaultConstructedCache.performTransactedAction(transactedAction);
143     }
144 
145     @Test
146     public void validateSwiftSerialization() throws Exception {
147 
148         // Assemble
149         final ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
150         final ObjectOutputStream oos = new ObjectOutputStream(baos);
151         final InMemoryMapCache anotherCache = new InMemoryMapCache();
152 
153         final List<String> messages = new ArrayList<String>();
154         final AbstractTransactedAction transactedAction = new AbstractTransactedAction("Irrelevant") {
155             @Override
156             public void doInTransaction() throws RuntimeException {
157                 messages.add("Performed transacted action.");
158             }
159         };
160 
161 
162         // Act
163         unitUnderTest.writeExternal(oos);
164 
165         final ObjectInputStream ois = new ObjectInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(baos.toByteArray()));
166         anotherCache.readExternal(ois);
167         anotherCache.performTransactedAction(transactedAction);
168 
169         // Assert
170         Assert.assertEquals(1, messages.size());
171         Assert.assertEquals("Performed transacted action.", messages.get(0));
172     }
173 }
